ui.panel.config.introduction: Here it is possible to configure your components and Home Assistant. Not everything is possible to configure from the UI yet, but we're working on it.
ui.panel.config.area_registry.caption: Area Registry
ui.panel.config.area_registry.descriptio: Overview of all areas in your home.
ui.panel.config.area_registry.picker.int: Areas are used to organize where devices are. This information will be used throughout Home Assistant to help you in organizing your interface, permissions and integrations with other systems.
To place devices in an area, use the link below to navigate to the integrations page and then click on a configured integration to get to the device cards.
ui.panel.config.area_registry.picker.no_: Looks like you have no areas yet!
ui.panel.config.core.caption: Općenito
ui.panel.config.core.description: Validate your configuration file and control the server
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.introd: Changing your configuration can be a tiresome process. We know. This section will try to make your life a little bit easier.
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.valida: Validate your configuration if you recently made some changes to your configuration and want to make sure that it is all valid
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.reload: Some parts of Home Assistant can reload without requiring a restart. Hitting reload will unload their current configuration and load the new one.
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.server: Kontrolirajte vaš Home Assistant server ... iz Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.customize.caption: Customization
ui.panel.config.customize.picker.introdu: Tweak per-entity attributes. Added/edited customizations will take effect immediately. Removed customizations will take effect when the entity is updated.
ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Automatizacija
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: Automatizacijski urednik omogućuje stvaranje i uređivanje automatizacije. Molimo pročitajte [upute] (https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/editor/) kako biste bili sigurni da ste ispravno konfigurirali Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.no_aut: Nismo mogli pronaći nikakve automatizirane uređaje
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.introd: Upotrijebite automatizaciju kako bi vaš dom oživio
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.unsave: Imate nespremljene izmjene. Jeste li sigurni da želite napustiti?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.trigge:
Okidači su ono što pokreće obradu pravila o automatizaciji. Moguće je odrediti više okidača za isto pravilo. Kada pokrenete okidač, Home Assistant provjerit će uvjete, ako ih ima i pozvati akciju. 

 [Saznajte više o pokretačima.] (Https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/trigger/)
Jeste li sigurni dai želite izbrisati?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.condit:
Uvjeti su neobvezni dio pravila o automatizaciji i mogu se upotrebljavati kako bi se spriječilo da se neka akcija dogodi prilikom pokretanja. Uvjeti izgledaju vrlo slični pokretačima, ali su vrlo različiti. Okidač će pogledati događaje koji se događaju u sustavu, a stanje samo gleda kako sustav izgleda upravo sada. Okidač može primijetiti da je prekidač uključen. Stanje može vidjeti samo ako je uključen ili isključen prekidač. 

 [Saznajte više o uvjetima.] (Https://home-assistant.io/docs/scripts/conditions/)
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.action:
Radnje su ono što će Home Assistant učiniti kada se aktivira automatizacija. 

 [Saznajte više o radnjama.] (Https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/action/)
ui.panel.config.script.caption: Script
ui.panel.config.cloud.caption: Home Assistant Cloud
ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Control away from home, integrate with Alexa and Google Assistant.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.caption: Entity Registry
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.picker.i: Home Assistant keeps a registry of every entity it has ever seen that can be uniquely identified. Each of these entities will have an entity ID assigned which will be reserved for just this entity.

Use the entity registry to override the name, change the entity ID or remove the entry from Home Assistant. Note, removing the entity registry entry won't remove the entity. To do that, follow the link below and remove it from the integrations page.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.u: This entity is not currently available.
ui.panel.config.person.caption: Persons
ui.panel.config.person.description: Manage the persons that Home Assistant tracks.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.name: Name
ui.panel.config.person.detail.device_tra: Select the devices that belong to this person.
ui.panel.config.integrations.caption: integracije
ui.panel.config.integrations.config_entr: Jeste li sigurni da želite izbrisati tu integraciju?
Ponovo pokrenite Home Assistant da biste dovršili uklanjanje ove integracije
ui.panel.config.users.caption: Korisnici
ui.panel.config.users.picker.title: Korisnici
ui.panel.config.users.editor.caption: View user
ui.panel.config.users.add_user.caption: Add user
ui.panel.config.users.add_user.name: Name
ui.panel.config.zha.caption: ZHA
ui.panel.config.zha.services.reconfigure: Reconfigure ZHA device (heal device). Use this if you are having issues with the device. If the device in question is a battery powered device please ensure it is awake and accepting commands when you use this service.
ui.panel.config.zha.services.updateDevic: Set a custom name for this device in the device registry.
ui.panel.config.zha.services.remove: Remove a device from the ZigBee network.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.head: Zigbee Home Automation - Add Devices
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.disc: Discovered devices will show up here. Follow the instructions for your device(s) and place the device(s) in pairing mode.
ui.panel.config.zwave.caption: Z-Wave
